General.Name: Shenzhen Neoway Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Neoway Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of communications products and related services for Industrial Internet of Things (IoT) primarily in China. Its products include 2G/3G/4G/NB-IoT/eMTC wireless communication modules which are used in smart energy, Internet of Vehicles, smart manufacturing, commercial retail, smart education and city, and other industries. The company also provides wireless communication terminals comprising 4G smart OBD, emergency lights and other terminals, abnormality monitors, property management equipment, IoT gateways and other terminals, and smart education terminals that include electronic student cards, which are primarily used in the fields of Internet of Vehicles, urban IoT perception, smart parks/communities/real estate properties, and smart education; and wireless devices. In addition, it also offers Neopipe cloud, an application software platform that supports the monitoring and optimization of wireless communication pipeline, network forecasting, remote fault diagnosis, and other functions; and Neoaccess cloud, a one-stop access service platform, which aims to build a stable and efficient communication access and application development system, as well as engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
